_header: One God is in heaven man of mild steven
_description: The prayer of the Indian girl recited to St. Thomas of India — four couplets inserted in the Speculum Sacerdotale

BodRawA362.First Lines: O god is in heueneman of mylde steuen…
BodRawA362.Last Lines:
…He is kynge of alle kyngesand to hym louten alle
                    þinges

BLAdd36791.First Lines: O god is in heueneman of mylde steuene…
BLAdd36791.Last Lines:
…He is kynge of alle kyngisAnd to hym lowteþ alle
                    þinges
